header.title: Aging Isn't A Curse. But Ageism Is A Serious Global Problem. | Think | NBC News
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Ashton Applewhite knows the (negative) stereotypes about getting older, but she's on a mission to change the way we think about aging. As the world's populating grows increasingly senior, Applewhite, the author of 'This Chair Rocks: A Manifesto Against Ageism,' joined THINK to talk about how we can take the shame out of this global phenomenon.. » Subscribe to NBC News: http://nbcnews.to/SubscribeToNBC. » Watch more NBC video: http://bit.ly/MoreNBCNews. . NBC News Digital is a collection of innovative and powerful news brands that deliver compelling, diverse and engaging news stories. header.socioLingVar: Age - General,Gender - General,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments

commentThread.commentText: If you have a victim mentality about anything, including aging, people will treat you as what you think. I have found that whenever I was constantly insecure about something, people reflected that back to me one way or another. This is why there are so many older individuals, men and women, who prosper even more at later stages in life; while others buy into feeling invisible- which is in their mind and they have confirmation bias for it as they are looking for ways that they are a victim instead of looking for solutions and the bright sides of things.

commentThread.user: Freedom of speech But mind what you say
commentThread.commentText: Please sign my petition to end age discrimination. [LINK] My petition: Allow people to legally change their age. People are discriminated against in the UK on the basis of thei r age more than any other characteristic. There is a growing number of people who s ee age as a self identity issue. There are a number of self identity issues which are now becoming accepted, why sho uld age be different.
I wanna be this woman in the future.
As far as finding a job past 60, it IS a global issue
[LINK] > Our campaign is currently raising money and awareness for ageism! Please feel free to donate
No shame in my game. The older I get, the less I care what other people think.. either that or I just can't remember what people say about me anymore. ha
